00008 public class SystemLayouter {
00009 
00010     final Integer distanceBetweenPorts          = new Integer(60);
00011     final Integer distanceBetweenSystmes        = new Integer(90);
00012     final Integer blockSizeHoriz                = new Integer(250);
00013     final Integer blockSizeVert                         = new Integer(100);
00014     final Integer portSizeHoriz                 = new Integer(30);
00015     final Integer portSizeVert                  = new Integer(14);
00016 
00017     private Integer top     = new Integer(40);
00018     private Integer left    = new Integer(35);
00019     private Integer bottom  = new Integer(0);
00020     private Integer right   = new Integer(0);
00021 
00022         public void startWithSystems() {
00023         top    = 40;
00024         left   = -140;
00025         }
00026 
00027         public void startWithOutports() {
00028         left = left + distanceBetweenSystmes + blockSizeHoriz;
00029         if (left < 0) {left = 100; }
00030         top = 50;
00031         }
00032 
00033         public String nextPort() {
00034         top = top + distanceBetweenPorts;
00035         bottom = top + portSizeVert;
00036         right = left + portSizeHoriz;
00037         String position = buildPositionString();         
00038                 return position;
00039         }
00040 
00041         public String nextSystem() {
00042         left = left + distanceBetweenSystmes + blockSizeHoriz;
00043         bottom = top + blockSizeVert;
00044         right = left + blockSizeHoriz;
00045         String position = buildPositionString();
00046                 return position;
00047         }
00048 
00049         private String buildPositionString() {
00050                 String format = "[%d %d %d %d]";
00051                 String position = String.format(format, left, top, right, bottom);
00052                 return position;
00053         }
00054
